CSAS_OUTPUT_0.KsqlTopic.Source.schema: `ROWKEY` STRING KEY, `B` BOOLEAN, `I` INTEGER, `BI` BIGINT, `D` DOUBLE, `S` STRING

CSAS_OUTPUT_0.OUTPUT.schema: `ROWKEY` STRING KEY, `KSQL_COL_0` BOOLEAN, `KSQL_COL_1` INTEGER, `KSQL_COL_2` BIGINT, `KSQL_COL_3` DOUBLE, `KSQL_COL_4` STRING

testCase.name: no op
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (B BOOLEAN, I INTEGER, BI BIGINT, D DOUBLE, S STRING) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='test_topic', VALUE_FORMAT='DELIMITED');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT
  CAST(TEST.B AS BOOLEAN) KSQL_COL_0,
  CAST(TEST.I AS INTEGER) KSQL_COL_1,
  CAST(TEST.BI AS BIGINT) KSQL_COL_2,
  CAST(TEST.D AS DOUBLE) KSQL_COL_3,
  CAST(TEST.S AS STRING) KSQL_COL_4
FROM TEST TEST
EMIT CHANGES;
